name: OboStar
description: Obostar is a unique skill puzzle game. Pilot your ship and touch the colored orbs to collect them.
minimum_requirements: OS: WINDOWS XP / WINDOWS VISTA / WINDOWS 7 / WINDOWS 8 / WINDOWS 10 Processor: Any 64 or 32 bit processor Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL Compatible Video card Storage: 40 MB available space
